issue.title: [Developer] Do not include list of commits from PR in squashed summary message
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7530](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7530). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We might assess whether these messages add useful information to the project's commit history. Other projects like Apache Spark have stopped preserving this information. This came up in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6136

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7530?focusedCommentId=17056336) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6565
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6565>
